file_content.text: Ahh!
Again! Hit him again! Make that thieving liar pay!
Argh... well, it's been fun, guys. But it looks like my ride is here. Nice knowing you.
Drop your weapons! Surrender--now!
Put that weapon on the floor! Now!
Just give me the prisoner, and no one will have to get hurt.
We can work this out.
Your words, not mine.
I made it this far. Do you really think you can stop me?
Don't be stupid.
He's got a point. You don't want to die here, do you?
She's got you there. Is this really how you want to go out?
I'm taking Vik. Stand aside or you die.
I'm not here to surrender.
He sounds pretty serious! You'd better do what he says!
I think she means it! I wouldn't mess with her!
Shut up! We do not negotiate with riffraff. The Empire fears no one, isn't that right?
Yes, sir!
You have a chance to end this peacefully.
Don't make things worse.
This is not a negotiation!
I won't ask again. Hand over the prisoner.
Last chance, people.
He'll pay for his crimes, and so will you!
You should've run.
What are you waiting for? Kill him!
Shoot her! Shoot her!
